name: your-spotify
description: your_spotify is a self-hosted dashboard and statistics platform for Spotify accounts. It imports listening history, visualizes top tracks and artists, and offers insights into listening habits over time.
features: Listening history: Import and store your complete Spotify listening history with timestamps and track details.
Top tracks analysis: Discover your most-played songs across different time periods with play count rankings.
Artist statistics: View your favorite artists with listening time, track counts, and discovery timelines.
Genre breakdown: Analyze your music taste by genre with visual charts showing distribution and trends.
Temporal insights: See when you listen most with hourly, daily, and monthly activity heatmaps.
Playlist analytics: Understand playlist composition with statistics on duration, diversity, and listening patterns.
Comparison tools: Compare listening habits across different time periods to track evolving music preferences.
Album tracking: Monitor complete album plays and discover your most-listened albums over time.
Discovery metrics: Track when you first discovered artists and songs to understand your music exploration journey.
Export functionality: Download your listening data in JSON or CSV format for external analysis.
Privacy control: Keep all listening data on your own server without sharing with third-party analytics services.
Automatic sync: Continuously import new listening history from Spotify to maintain up-to-date statistics.
